cause.description:
help to restore the pitbulls reputation as a proud and beautifull speciman. a full grown male pitbull is something to behold and is a loving and devoted creature. Like any creature however if abused or mistreated will react in the same way as any other animal. So don't hate the puppy hate the man.
1. help regain the pitbulls reputation.
2. stop the haters!
3. It's not the dog, its the man!
cause.name: stop hating pitbulls
